solution_line_template: With the boy's contribution, there are {walnuts_already_there} + {boy_gathers} = <<{walnuts_already_there}+{boy_gathers}={walnuts_after_boy_gathers}>>{walnuts_after_boy_gathers} walnuts.
When he drops {boy_drops}, now they have {walnuts_after_boy_gathers} - {boy_drops} = <<{walnuts_after_boy_gathers}-{boy_drops}={walnuts_after_boy_drops}>>{walnuts_after_boy_drops} walnuts.
The girl adds to their stash, making the count {walnuts_after_boy_drops} + {girl_brings} = <<{walnuts_after_boy_drops}+{girl_brings}={walnuts_after_girl_brings}>>{walnuts_after_girl_brings} walnuts.
When the girl eats {girl_eats}, the final count is {walnuts_after_girl_brings} - {girl_eats} = <<{walnuts_after_girl_brings}-{girl_eats}={final_walnuts}>>{final_walnuts} walnuts.
